abstract: Wrinkles in the high-tech materials covering parts made by an Italian supplier have raised new concerns about when the new plane will fly.
snippet: Wrinkles in the high-tech materials covering parts made by an Italian supplier have raised new concerns about when the new plane will fly.
lead_paragraph: The Boeing Company has hit another snag in its 787 Dreamliner program, raising fresh concerns about when the fuel-efficient plane will be ready for its first test flight.

headline.main: Boeing Halts Production of Flawed Dreamliner Part
headline.print_headline: Boeing Halts Production Of Flawed Dreamliner Part
